trans-unit.source: The exception to this is if IPAMConfig is unset (i.e. null) in one container but not the other. This happens when no static IP configuration is set, and automatic IP configuration is in effect. So, in order to report on changes between automatic IP configuration in one container and static IP configuration in another container (as we need to do for the docker_container.running state), automatic IP configuration will also be checked in these cases.
trans-unit.target: 例外是，如果在一个容器中未设置 IPAMConfig （即未设置），但在另一个容器中未设置。如果未设置静态IP配置，并且自动IP配置生效，则会发生这种情况。因此，为了报告一个容器中的自动IP配置和另一个容器中的静态IP配置之间的变化（我们需要对 docker_container.running 状态进行此操作），在这种情况下，还将检查自动IP配置。

trans-unit.source: The main difference between this function and managed is that the later generates and loads the configuration only when there are differences between the existing configuration on the device and the expected configuration. Additionally, the output of the managed is different, in such a way that the pchange field in the output contains structured data, rather than text.
trans-unit.target: 此功能与 managed 功能之间的主要区别是，仅当设备上的现有配置与预期配置之间存在差异时，后者才会生成并加载配置。根据平台和硬件功能的不同，一个可能比另一个更优化。此外， managed 的输出是不同的，其方式是输出中的 pchange 字段包含结构化数据，而不是文本。
